description: This header file contains prototype definitions for internal functions of the Slap Bmc2 Command Object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) for the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It declares functions related to resetting the object, managing command parameters, and checking command state.

methods.name: SlapBmc2ComoReset
methods.description: Resets the internal state of the Bmc2 Command Object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2ComoGetCount
methods.description: Returns the count of some collection within the object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2ComoGetCommandName
methods.description: Retrieves the name of the command associated with the object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2ComoGetParamByIndex
methods.description: Gets the parameter value at the specified index.

methods.name: SlapBmc2ComoRemoveAllParams
methods.description: Removes all parameters from the object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2ComoSetParamByIndex
methods.description: Sets a parameter value at the specified index.

methods.name: SlapBmc2ComoIsAborted
methods.description: Checks if the command operation has been aborted.
